_header: Lo here is a lad light
_description: Poem on Delight, from a pageant — ten 6-line stanzas

BodTan407.First Lines:
Lo here is a ladde lyghtAl fresch I ȝow
                    plyght…
BodTan407.Last Lines:
…þer inne delyght I with alle myn mythisAs for wele most
                    speciall
